data.message: Wow so glad you show SO0000 much "Detroit love" right before your new album. Wait where have you been the last 2+yrs..

replies.message: He's has one of greatest rap careers of all time he doesn't have to make music. Duh
Byron Logan past tense. Had. He's old news and let's be real his last 3 albums, SUCKED.
And my point wasn't about music, it's about where was he showing all this Detroit love and pride last couple years? But irony new album next month and he comes out of his recluse status
Whitney Rickman lmao his awards and nominations speak otherwise bitch.
Eddy Grande Herrera  Bryce Rickman  woah there killer, I’m sorry I hurt your feelings lololol

Whitney Rickman
Oh.
I'm sorry. 
I missed the memo. 
What internationally recognized Record Label are you the CEO of while also running a world famous clothing company and collaborating with artists like Rihanna; Pink; Akon; and Nicki Minaj.
Yes; thank you: I'll wait.
Ms. Katrin Blumenfeld
Ms. Katrin Blumenfeld

TRANSLATION:
I forgot about Dre.

He donated to flint Michigan water crisis. Donated to schools all over Detroit.  Just because Whitney Rickman doesn't hear about it doesn't mean it doesn't. I didn't know that Em has to have your approval for anything.

Byron Logan

I need some clarification from Whitney Rickman.
You stated that Eminem's last three albums SUCKED. Does that include these tracks?

Spacebound
Love The Way You Lie
Not Afraid
We Made You
3 A.M.
*******

Post Script:
I forgot to throw in the internationally successful 
club banger...

Crack A Bottle
Lol wow I really got y’all worked up 😂
And yes it does, those songs suck lol

Whitney Rickman
I don't understand your last comment on this message board's thread.
Perhaps you can clarify matters for me.
You really have all who worked up?
